labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Claude Web Search" is designed to enable up-to-date web searches through Claude's API. It allows users to filter search results by domain and customize the number of results returned. The primary functionality is information retrieval from the web, integration into applications, and tailoring the search experience.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Web Search & Research" was chosen because the core functionality is centered around performing and customizing web searches for information retrieval. No secondary labels are needed as the predefined categories cover the main use case. No unique functionality warrants a custom label.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.overview: Enable your LLMs to perform up-to-date web searches using Claude's web search API. Filter results by domain and configure the number of results to tailor the search experience. Seamlessly integrate web search capabilities into your applications for enhanced information retrieval.

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Deploy Server Claude Web Search Claim Server @Doriandarko/claude-search-mcp Try in Playground

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@Doriandarko/claude-search-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: anthropicApiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Anthropic API key for Claude web search
